body.p: Fayette County, Lexington, Kentucky, china merchant, clerk, and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Labelle S. Bruce. Father of Leslie C. Bruce, F. T. Bruce, M. T. Bruce, and K. D. Bruce. Graduated from Transylvania University in 1846. China merchant in Fayette County, Kentucky in 1850. County court clerk in Lexington, Kentucky in 1860. Served in the Lexington Chasseurs (U.S.A.) as captain in 1860. Mustered into service as colonel of the 20th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) on January 6, 1862. Appointed commander of the 22nd Brigade of the Army of the Cumberland (U.S.A.) on January 18, 1862. Resigned from service on June 24, 1864.
